sys_update_xml.payload: customTest Pop Up' var m = 'This is a test do you agree?' spModal.open({ title: 'Do you agree?', message: h + m, buttons: [ {label:'✔ ${Yes}', primary: true}, {label:'✘ ${No}', cancel: true} ] }).then(function() { c.agree = 'yes'; }, function() { c.agree = 'no'; }) } } ]]>csp_instancetrueabiomed_gr_aachen_ackfalseAbioMed_GR_Aachen_Ackfalsefalsesp_widgetadmin2019-02-12 20:51:273ab6a4dedb6ba3400a9572ffbf9619a914AbioMed_GR_Aachen_Ackglobalglobalsp_widget_3ab6a4dedb6ba3400a9572ffbf9619a9admin2019-02-15 00:51:48
